definition: suffix of a noun of locality
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯会把他当成一个左边锋还是中场球员？

sentences.english: Ronaldo camped on the left-wing to battle with Ferreira.
sentences.chinese: 罗纳尔多打左边锋，对垒费雷拉。

sentences.english: A natural left winger would be a useful addition.
sentences.chinese: 一个出色的左边锋将是个不错的增置。

sentences.english: But he started off wide right, then Torres went there.
sentences.chinese: 但他最初是打右边锋的，之后托雷斯又去打这个位置。

sentences.english: The galvanising presence of John Terry and penetrative wing-play of Arjen Robben cannot be restored quickly enough;
sentences.chinese: 和极有渗透性的边锋罗本都不能很快恢复健康。

sentences.english: The outside-tight headed a very nice ball.
sentences.chinese: 这右边锋顶了一个非常好的头球。

sentences.english: United did not need an outside-left stationed wide.
sentences.chinese: 曼联不需要专门的左边锋。

sentences.english: Inter offered striker David Suazo in a straight swap for Roma winger Amantino Mancini.
sentences.chinese: 国际提议用苏亚索交换罗马边锋曼奇尼。

sentences.english: I played as a left-winger at ice hockey.
sentences.chinese: 我打冰球的时候是一名左边锋。

sentences.english: Right at the demo, all of my wiring shorted out.
sentences.chinese: 这右边锋顶了一个非常好的头球。

sentences.english: Winger Zoran Tosic has joined FC Cologne on loan until the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 边锋托西奇以租借的形式加盟科隆，直到赛季结束。

sentences.english: There are several press reports reporting that Arsenal are listening to offers for Swedish winger Freddie Ljungberg.
sentences.chinese: 新闻报道了阿森纳想出售瑞典边锋永贝里的消息。

sentences.english: I'll play the left winger, but I hope to be chosen as a goalie.
sentences.chinese: 我被选为打左边锋，但我希望做守门员。

sentences.english: He played prop forward and I never once saw hellom shy away from a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 他当时打熬头排边锋，我从未见他在挑战眼前退缩过。

sentences.english: Obertan dazzled and looks increasingly like the exciting winger we love at United.
sentences.chinese: 奥贝坦看上去越来越像我们曼联最喜欢的那种边锋了。

sentences.english: Wolves are without winger Michael Kightly because of a suspension.
sentences.chinese: 狼队却有边锋礼特利停赛缺席。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
